ResultActivity
Information ScanCamera ShowResult 请填写返回界面参数 开始拍照 当前设备不支持闪光灯 您的授权已于 到期，请更新授权，否则识别功能将停止使用！ 在strings文件中未找到company_name字段 错误代码: 请将银行卡正面置于此区域，尝试对齐边缘 再按一次退出 点击输入卡号
银行名称: 银行行号: 卡片名称: 卡片类型: 未知的卡片类型 michell 达飞普惠财富投资管理（北京）有限公司
激活程序 首次使用若能联网请在此填写序列号，不区分大小写，并点击“授权验证”按钮. 在线激活 激活成功
请连接网络 网络不可用 数据返回为空 \?
The image acquired was good. The fingerprint image was too noisy due to suspected or detected dirt on the sensor. For example, it\'s reasonable to return this after multiple AcquiredInsufficient or actual detection of dirt on the sensor (stuck pixels, swaths, etc.). The user is expected to take action to clean the sensor when this is returned. The fingerprint image was too noisy to process due to a detected condition (i.e. dry skin) or a possibly dirty sensor. Only a partial fingerprint image was detected. During enrollment, the user should be informed on what needs to happen to resolve this problem, e.g., "press firmly on sensor." The fingerprint image was incomplete due to quick motion. While mostly appropriate for linear array sensors, this could also happen if the finger was moved during acquisition. The user should be asked to move the finger slower (linear) or leave the finger on the sensor longer. The fingerprint image was unreadable due to lack of motion. This is most appropriate for linear array sensors that require a swipe motion. The operation was canceled because the fingerprint sensor is unavailable. For example, this may happen when the user is switched, the device is locked, or another pending operation prevents or disables it. The hardware is unavailable. Try again later. The operation was canceled because the API is locked out due to too many attempts. Error state returned for operations like enrollment; the operation cannot be completed because there\'s not enough storage remaining to complete the operation. Error state returned when the current request has been running too long. This is intended to prevent programs from waiting for the fingerprint sensor indefinitely. The timeout is platform and sensor-specific, but is generally about 30 seconds. Error state returned when the sensor was unable to process the current image. Confirm your fingerprint. Touch sensor 再按一次退出

请输入6-20为数字、字母或字符组合密码 手机号码不能为空 手机号码格式不正确 验证码已发出 请填写身份证号 身份证号格式不正确
"当前定位城市 : " 定位失败 定位中... 城市中文名或拼音 没有找到，换个词试试~ 选择城市 热门城市

授信用途 帮助 申请授信 申请提交 个人信息 影像资料 扫一扫 扫描商家二维码 请填写以下信息完成授信并提交申请 您操作提交申请按钮表示您允许提交授信申请 温馨提示：\n 1.授信申请过程中，您必须按顺序填写并提交相应内容，请您根据提示操作。\n 2.授信审核过程中，会有审核专员与您联系，核实信息，请您保持电话畅通。
